segments.text: So , Jack , do you believe in ghosts ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , not really . Why do you ask ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Because I want to tell you about the time that I saw a ghost .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It was many years ago , when I was a little child . It was the middle of the night , and I went to get a drink of water from the kitchen . I walked out of my room and was at the top of the stairs , when ...
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: So that's where you saw the ghost ? In your house ? What did it look like ? Was it hideous ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It was a big , green thing that looked like a person . It was in the kitchen , and it slowly moved towards the stairs ...
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I hid so that it couldn't see me . Slowly it got closer and closer , until ...
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Until what ? What happened ? Did you see it clearly ? Did it attack you ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It moved slowly up the stairs , step by step , and I could hear its approaching footsteps . When it finally got to the top of the stairs , I realized that it was my father in his green pajamas . He had gone to get a late night snack .
segments.speaker: S1
